title: Akshay Shared His Favorite Deleted Scene From Jolly LLB 2 & You‚Äôll Wonder Why It Was Deleted
text:
by Shuchi Bhatnagar - Feb 20, 2017 
‚ÄúJolly LLB 2‚Äù starring Akshay Kumar in the lead role is doing good on the box office in terms of collections even after a week and will soon enter the 100 crore club, giving tough competition to the movies which released after it. It actually made everyone ‚Äòjolly‚Äô including the actors, the makers, fans and critics and got applauded from people across the country. 
Recently, the Khiladi of Bollywood took to Twitter and shared a scene which was removed from the movie. He wrote, ‚ÄúThank you so much for giving so much love to #JollyLLB2 . Sharing with you‚Äôll one of my favourite deleted scene, have a Jolly good morning‚Äù. 
The scene is of the court and features judge Saurabh Shukla with Annu Kapoor and of course, Akshay. It will make you laugh but the punchline is the last dialogue of the video! 
Watch The Video: Thank you so much for giving so much love to #JollyLLB2 üôèüèª Sharing with you'll one of my favourite deleted scene, have a Jolly good morning üòâ pic.twitter.com/wOOOXW0egL

Click here to watch this video directly on Twitter 
Four scenes from ‚ÄúJolly LLB 2‚Äù were ordered to be removed by the censor board; however, it‚Äôs not one of them. 
What could be the reason of deleting it from the film according to you? Let us know in the comments section below. Share Your Views In Comments Below Shuchi Bhatnagar SIMILAR ARTICLES KRK Tried To Make Fun Of Swara‚Äôs Upcoming Movie! She Shut His Mouth With An Epic Reply! Feb 20, 2017
